title: Australia news live: UTS to ‘suspend’ 140 courses over six faculties; business council proposes plan to cut $110bn red tape
summary: Follow today’s news live Get our breaking news email , free app or daily news podcast Australia’s second world war dead will be honoured in a ceremony at the Australian War Memorial today as the nation marks the 80th anniversary of the conflict, Australian Associated Press reports. They will include Warrant Officer Class 2 Frederick Balfe Emanuel who died aged 22 weeks before Victory in the Pacific Day on 15 August 15, when Japan announced its unconditional surrender to the Allies. We have become too complex a country in which to do business, and that’s a massive handbrake on our ability to lift productivity and living standards. At the upcoming economic reform roundtable, we have an opportunity to address excessive and duplicative rules that impose unnecessary costs on both businesses and consumers. In Victoria, a cafe owner needs 36 separate licences and approvals before they can pour the first coffee, while a tradie on the Gold Coast needs to pay hundreds of dollars in permits just to fix a tap over the NSW border, this is the regulation we need to fix. Continue reading...

title: Supreme Court opens door to social media age-gating in US
summary: The Supreme Court will let Mississippi’s social media age verification law take effect while the case is being argued in court. In an unsigned ruling on Thursday, the court declined to block the law after an emergency petition from trade association NetChoice. The order offers no explanation, but in a concurring opinion, Justice Brett Kavanaugh […]

title: Stablecoins Set to Capture $1 Trillion Payment Volume by 2028, Could Reshape US Monetary Policy: Report
summary: Keyrock–Bitso research has projected a trillion in stablecoins volume by 2030, with stablecoins set to handle 12% of cross-border flows and possibly 10% of U.S. money supply. Onchain settlement has cut costs and time, while issuers’ T-bill holdings have affected yields and market structure. The post Stablecoins Set to Capture $1 Trillion Payment Volume by 2028, Could Reshape US Monetary Policy: Report appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Russia and Ukraine Agree: A Trump Summit Is a Big Win for Putin
summary: The talks on Friday in Alaska pull the Russian leader out of diplomatic isolation from the West, and Ukrainian and European leaders fear it gives him an opening to sway the American president.
